name: Fogscar Vault
description: The crumbling, rune-lit depths of an Old Empire ruin hidden beneath Rustmarket. Ancient mechanisms hum faintly.

stages.description: More scavengers guard a narrow passage. They hiss and brandish crude weapons, their movements twitchy and unpredictable.
With a grinding sound, an ancient stone sentry activates, its rune-etched eyes glowing menacingly.
This chamber seems to be a key junction. A well-maintained Sentry stands guard, flanked by desperate scavengers.
The air crackles with latent energy. Two constructs bar the way to what looks like a significant vault door.
The final approach to the inner sanctum. The defenses here are formidable, a true test before reaching the vault's heart.
